rows.label: qst400303_msg0001
rows.name:
The real problem is the
Perfect Range Sensor.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0002
rows.name: Can we not get one by salvaging?

rows.label: qst400303_msg0003
rows.name:
I haven't heard of people
finding those much.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0004
rows.name:
It depends on the Divine Beast's position
and the state of the Cloud Sea. Sometimes
you just can't find them at all.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0005
rows.name:
And even in the right place,
it's all down to luck. Sometimes
things just don't work out...

rows.label: qst400303_msg0006
rows.name:
We don't have time to be
standing around, so we
can't rely on salvaging.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0007
rows.name: Hey, can I ask you something?

rows.label: qst400303_msg0008
rows.name:
Looking at you, the young
lady is a Blade and the boy
is her Driver, right?

rows.label: qst400303_msg0009
rows.name: Eh?

rows.label: qst400303_msg0010
rows.name: Um... Is that how it looks?

rows.label: qst400303_msg0011
rows.name:
Wait just a moment, mo!! Actually,
Boss and Tora are Blades too, mo!

rows.label: qst400303_msg0012
rows.name: Does that make me the Driver?

rows.label: qst400303_msg0013
rows.name: No, surely I would be the Driver.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0014
rows.name:
This makes no sense! We need
to get our story straight...

rows.label: qst400303_msg0015
rows.name: Alright, alright, calm down.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0016
rows.name: I'm a botanist.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0017
rows.name:
A botanist!? Looks can
be deceiving, mo!

rows.label: qst400303_msg0018
rows.name: I get that a lot...

rows.label: qst400303_msg0019
rows.name:
I wanted to go to Lasqam Island for
fieldwork, but I had to turn back
because of the monsters there.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0020
rows.name:
I asked the Imperial Army
for help, but they seemed
busy and wouldn't listen.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0021
rows.name:
So when I saw you skilled-looking
lot, I thought this would be
an easy job for you.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0022
rows.name:
If you do this for me, I'll give
you the Perfect Range Sensor I
have in storage... How about it?

rows.label: qst400303_msg0023
rows.name: That's a timely offer.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0024
rows.name: Alright... We'll give it a shot!

rows.label: qst400303_msg0025
rows.name:
Lasqam Island is the one you
can see to your left when you
leave the city entrance.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0026
rows.name:
Please defeat the Juppen
Krabble there. Be careful.
